speaker: Rick
text: Morty, you know what's fascinating about Natural Language Processing? It's not the understanding of human language, it's the misinterpretations!

speaker: Morty
text: Rick, I think you might have missed the point. NLP is about analyzing, understanding, and generating human language.

speaker: Rick
text: Ah, Morty, but where's the fun in that? Let's make a bot that interprets 'I love you' as 'pass the ketchup' instead.

speaker: Morty
text: Rick, seriously? That's not even close to natural language processing. If anything, that's a blooper.

speaker: Rick
text: Oh, come on, Morty! Look on the bright side - we could create hilarious conversations like this!

speaker: Morty
text: Rick, while yours might be hilarious, they're not natural or meaningful. Remember, our goal isn't chaos, it's understanding.

speaker: Rick
text: Fine, fine, we'll aim for the gold star this time – 'interpret and understanddese human words'. But I reserve the right to justify randomness as 'research'!

speaker: Morty
text: Rick, I swear, someday you're going to get us in big trouble with your exotic experiments.

speaker: Rick
text: Oh, lighten up, Morty! NLP is just a stepping stone to unlocking the secrets of the multiverse. It's all part of the adventure!

speaker: Morty
text: And I'm part of that adventure, Rick. But we need to respect the boundaries and not Mis-NLP-ulate human emotions.

speaker: Rick
text: ‘Mis-NLP-ulate,' Morty? That's a keeper! Remember, when in doubt, just go with the wacky flow.

speaker: Morty
text: Rick, I love you, but sometimes I worry we'll end up causing more harm than good.
